c=document.querySelector(".c-header"),d=document.body,e=0,f="px",g=document.querySelector(".c-header-nav-bar"),h=document.querySelector(".c-breaking-alert");window.refHeaderHeight=c.offsetHeight,b(),window.addEventListener("resize",a),g.addEventListener("transitionend",a),h&&h.addEventListener("transitionend",a)},setupLazyLoader(){function a(a){const b=a.querySelectorAll(e);b.forEach(a=>{const b=a.firstChild.data;a.insertAdjacentHTML("afterend",b),a.remove()})}function b(b,c){b.forEach(b=>{b.isIntersecting&&(a(b.target),c.unobserve(b.target),am.log("debug","%cLazy Observation Activated%c for%c "+b.target.id,"color: lime;","color: inherit;","color: PapayaWhip;"))})}function c(b,c){const e=c.offsetTop-d,f=window.scrollY+window.innerHeight;f>=e&&(window.removeEventListener("scroll",b),a(c),am.log("debug","%cLazy Check Activated%c for%c "+c.id,"color: gold;","color: inherit;","color: PapayaWhip;"))}const d="50",e=".u-lazy-child",f=document.querySelectorAll(".u-lazy-parent"),g=("IntersectionObserver"in window),h=g?/\{\s*\[native code\]\s*\}/.test(""+IntersectionObserver):0;if(h){const a=new IntersectionObserver(b,{root:null,rootMargin:"50px",threshold:0});f.forEach(b=>a.observe(b))}else f.forEach(a=>{const code\]\s*\}/.test(""+IntersectionObserver):0,c=document.querySelectorAll(".c-most-popular-posts .o-card")[0],d=(a,b)=>{a[0].isIntersecting&&(b.unobserve(a[0].target),am.log("debug","Observation Activated"),c.parentNode.classList.add("has-animation"))};if(b){const a=new IntersectionObserver(d,{root:null,rootMargin:"0px",threshold:1});a.observe(c)}else missing!   <!--AdThrive Head Tag -->
  <script>
   (function(w, d) {
    w.adthrive = w.adthrive || {};
    w.adthrive.cmd = w.adthrive.cmd || [];
    w.adthrive.plugin = 'adthrive-ads-1.0.39';
    w.adthrive.host = 'ads.adthrive.com';
	w.adthrive.threshold = Math.floor(Math.random() * 100 + 1);
    var s = d.createElement('script');
    s.async = true;
    s.referrerpolicy = 'no-referrer-when-downgrade';
    s.src = 'https://' + w.adthrive.host + '/sites/5ac64c44fdf4d60603abe69d/ads.min.js?referrer=' + w.encodeURIComponent(w.location.href) + '&threshold='+w.adthrive.threshold;
    var n = d.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
    n.parentNode.insertBefore(s, n);
})(window, document);

function cam_unique_array(a) {
    var seen = {};
    return a.filter(function(item) {
        return seen.hasOwnProperty(item) ? false : (seen[item] = true);
    });
}
window.adthrive.cmd.push(function() {
    cam_targeting_values = [];
	cam_unique_targeting=[];
    var cam_abrams_loc = encodeURIComponent(window.location.pathname.split('/')[1]).toLowerCase();
    if (cam_abrams_loc.length == 0) {
        cam_targeting_values.push('abrams_home');
    } else if (cam_abrams_loc.length <= 35) {
        cam_targeting_values.push('abrams_' + cam_abrams_loc);
    } else {
        cam_targeting_values.push('abrams_' + cam_abrams_loc.substring(0, 33));
    }

    if (cam_targeting_values.length > 0) {
		cam_unique_targeting=cam_unique_array(cam_targeting_values);
        window.adthrive.siteAds.targeting.push({
            key: 'at_custom_1',
            value: cam_unique_targeting,
        });
    }
    setTimeout(function() {
        window.adthrive.advertiser_ids = [];
        window.adthrive.slots._slots.forEach((values, key) => {
            if (values.googleTagSlot.getResponseInformation()) {
                if (values.googleTagSlot.getResponseInformation().advertiserId == 4811960334) {
                    console.log('CAM - disabling refresh on : ' + key);
                    window.adthrive.slotManager.updateRefreshTimeout(key, 0);
                }
            }
        });
    }, 10000);
});
  </script>

   var _comscore = _comscore || [];
  _comscore.push({c1: '2', c2: '9304643'});
  (function() {
    var s = document.createElement('script'), el = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; s.async = true;
    s.src = (document.location.protocol == 'https:' ? 'https://sb' : 'http://b') + '.scorecardresearch.com/beacon.js';
    el.parentNode.insertBefore(s, el);
  })();

  <!-- Chartbeat -->
  <script type="text/javascript">
   var _sf_startpt = (new Date()).getTime();
  </script>
  <!-- start chartbeat -->
  <script type="text/javascript">
   var _sf_async_config={};
			/** CONFIGURATION START **/
			_sf_async_config.uid = 3557;
			_sf_async_config.domain = "themarysue.com";
						/** CONFIGURATION END **/
			(function(){
				function loadChartbeat() {
					window._sf_endpt=(new Date()).getTime();
					var e = document.createElement("script");
					e.setAttribute("language", "javascript");
					e.setAttribute("type", "text/javascript");
					e.setAttribute("src","https://static.chartbeat.com/js/chartbeat.js");
					document.body.appendChild(e);
				}
				var oldonload = window.onload;
				window.onload = (typeof window.onload != "function") ?
				loadChartbeat : function() { oldonload(); loadChartbeat(); };
			})();
  </script>
  <!-- end chartbeat -->

    var ga = document.createElement('script'); ga.type = 'text/javascript'; ga.async = true;

  })();
  function recordOutboundLink(link, category, action) {
    _gat._getTrackerByName()._trackEvent(category, action);
    setTimeout('document.location = "' + link.href + '"', 100);
  }
  </script>

  }(document, 'script', 'facebook-jssdk'));

  <script>
   window.OneSignal = window.OneSignal || [];

      OneSignal.push( function() {
        OneSignal.SERVICE_WORKER_UPDATER_PATH = "OneSignalSDKUpdaterWorker.js.php";
        OneSignal.SERVICE_WORKER_PATH = "OneSignalSDKWorker.js.php";
        OneSignal.SERVICE_WORKER_PARAM = { scope: '/' };

        OneSignal.setDefaultNotificationUrl("https://www.themarysue.com");
        var oneSignal_options = {};
        window._oneSignalInitOptions = oneSignal_options;

        oneSignal_options['wordpress'] = true;
oneSignal_options['appId'] = '0db02b7c-a211-4837-a341-fb19f5134f3b';

oneSignal_options['promptOptions']['siteName'] = "The Mary Sue";
                OneSignal.init(window._oneSignalInitOptions);
                OneSignal.showSlidedownPrompt();      });

      function documentInitOneSignal() {
        var oneSignal_elements = document.getElementsByClassName("OneSignal-prompt");

        var oneSignalLinkClickHandler = function(event) { OneSignal.push(['registerForPushNotifications']); event.preventDefault(); };        for(var i = 0; i < oneSignal_elements.length; i++)
          oneSignal_elements[i].addEventListener('click', oneSignalLinkClickHandler, false);
      }

      if (document.readyState === 'complete') {
           documentInitOneSignal();
      }
      else {
           window.addEventListener("load", function(event){
               documentInitOneSignal();
          });
      }
  </script>

       <a class="c-header-nav-bar__link u-contrast-hover" href="http://shop.themarysue.com/">
        Gizmos and Gadgets
       </a>
      </li>
     </ul>
    </li>
   </ul>
   <div class="o-menu u-100w@mobile is-closed-menu" id="menu">

   <div class="o-slice o-fcc-full@desktop">
    <div class="o-slice-inner c-atf">
     <section class="c-lead-post o-card-list" id="lead-post">
      <div class="o-card u-flex-col">
       <a class="c-lead-post__img-link o-card__img-cell" href="https://www.themarysue.com/zack-snyder-unpacks-that-wild-justice-league-ending/">
        <img class="c-lead-post__img" src="https://am24.mediaite.com/tms/cnt/uploads/2021/03/justice-league-snyder-cut-joker-768x432.jpg"/>
       </a>
       <div class="o-card__info-cell">
        <h4 class="c-lead-post__subheading">
         You had me at "five-part trilogy", sir.
        </h4>
        <h3 class="c-lead-post__headline">
         <a class="c-lead-post__headline-link" href="https://www.themarysue.com/zack-snyder-unpacks-that-wild-justice-league-ending/">
          Zack Snyder Unpacks That Wild
          <em>
           Justice League
          </em>
          Ending
         </a>
        </h3>
        <div class="o-dateline c-lead-post-dateline">
         <span class="o-dateline__author">
          <span class="o-dateline__author-prefix">
           By
          </span>
          Chelsea Steiner
         </span>
         <span class="o-dateline__date">
          Mar 21st
         </span>
        </div>
        <a class="o-comments-link c-lead-post__comments-link" data-disqus-identifier="541125 https://www.themarysue.com/?p=541125" href="https://www.themarysue.com/zack-snyder-unpacks-that-wild-justice-league-ending/#disqus_thread">
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>
     </section>

   <section class="o-fcc-full@desktop c-curated-posts-section o-slice u-lazy-parent" id="curated-posts">
    <div class="o-slice-inner o-card-container">
     <div class="heading o-section-heading o-herald c-home-curated-posts-heading" id="curated-heading">
      <div class="o-section-label">
       Spotlight
      </div>
     </div>
     <ul class="o-card-list c-curated-posts">
      <li class="c-curated-post o-card u-flex-col">
       <noscript class="u-lazy-child">

        </a>
       </noscript>

   <section class="o-fcc-2x@desktop c-home-chron-posts c-home-chron-posts-part1 o-chron-posts o-card-container u-lazy-parent" id="home-chron-posts-part1">
    <div class="heading o-section-heading o-herald c-home-chron-posts-heading" id="chron-heading">
     <div class="o-section-label">
      Happening Now
     </div>
    </div>
    <ul class="c-home-chron-post-list o-card-list">
     <li class="o-chron-post o-card u-flex-col u-flex-row@desktop">
      <noscript class="u-lazy-child">
       <a class="featured-img o-chron-post__img-link o-card__img-cell" href="https://www.themarysue.com/things-we-saw-today-american-horror-storys-10th-season-will-be-a-double-feature/">
        <img class="o-chron-post__img o-card__img" src="https://am24.mediaite.com/tms/cnt/uploads/2018/11/ahs-apocalypse-432x243.jpg"/>
       </a>
      </noscript>
      <div class="o-chron-post__info o-card__info-cell">
       <h3 class="o-chron-post__headline">
        <a class="o-chron-post__headline-link" href="https://www.themarysue.com/things-we-saw-today-american-horror-storys-10th-season-will-be-a-double-feature/">
         Things We Saw Today:
         <em>
          American Horror Story
         </em>
         's 10th Season Will Be a 'Double Feature'
        </a>
       </h3>
       <h4 class="o-chron-post__subheading">
        Plus Zack Snyder,
        <em>
         Tenet
        </em>
        , and more!
       </h4>
       <div class="o-chron-post__meta">
        <div class="o-dateline o-chron-post__dateline">
         <span class="o-dateline__author">
          <span class="o-dateline__author-prefix">
           By
          </span>
          Chelsea Steiner
         </span>
         <span class="o-dateline__date">
          Mar 21st
         </span>
        </div>
        <a class="o-comments-link o-chron-post__comments" data-disqus-identifier="541117 https://www.themarysue.com/?p=541117" href="https://www.themarysue.com/things-we-saw-today-american-horror-storys-10th-season-will-be-a-double-feature/#disqus_thread">
        </a>
       </div>
       <div class="o-chron-post__excerpt">
        <p class="o-chron-post__excerpt-text">
         At long last, Ryan Murphy has announced the title for the 10th season of his FX juggernaut series
         <em>
          American Horror Story
         </em>
         .
        </p>
        <a class="o-chron-post__excerpt-read-more" href="https://www.themarysue.com/things-we-saw-today-american-horror-storys-10th-season-will-be-a-double-feature/">
         Read More
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>
     </li>
     <li class="o-chron-post o-card u-flex-col u-flex-row@desktop">
      <noscript class="u-lazy-child">
       <a class="featured-img o-chron-post__img-link o-card__img-cell" href="https://www.themarysue.com/i-am-proud-to-be-asian-sandra-oh-speaks-at-a-stop-asian-hate-protest/">
        <img class="o-chron-post__img o-card__img" src="https://am24.mediaite.com/tms/cnt/uploads/2021/03/sandraoh-432x243.jpg"/>
       </a>
      </noscript>
      <div class="o-chron-post__info o-card__info-cell">
       <h3 class="o-chron-post__headline">
        <a class="o-chron-post__headline-link" href="https://www.themarysue.com/i-am-proud-to-be-asian-sandra-oh-speaks-at-a-stop-asian-hate-protest/">
         ‘I Am Proud to Be Asian’: Sandra Oh Speaks at a Stop Asian Hate Protest
        </a>
       </h3>
       <h4 class="o-chron-post__subheading">
        “I will challenge everyone here, if you see something, will you help me?"
       </h4>
       <div class="o-chron-post__meta">
        <div class="o-dateline o-chron-post__dateline">
         <span class="o-dateline__author">
          <span class="o-dateline__author-prefix">
           By
          </span>
          Chelsea Steiner
         </span>
         <span class="o-dateline__date">
          Mar 21st
         </span>
        </div>
        <a class="o-comments-link o-chron-post__comments" data-disqus-identifier="541129 https://www.themarysue.com/?p=541129" href="https://www.themarysue.com/i-am-proud-to-be-asian-sandra-oh-speaks-at-a-stop-asian-hate-protest/#disqus_thread">
        </a>
       </div>
       <div class="o-chron-post__excerpt">
        <p class="o-chron-post__excerpt-text">
         Oh's sentiments were shared by other Asian American actors, including
         <em>
          Riverdale
         </em>
         's Charles Melton, who penned an emotional essay in Variety.
        </p>
        <a class="o-chron-post__excerpt-read-more" href="https://www.themarysue.com/i-am-proud-to-be-asian-sandra-oh-speaks-at-a-stop-asian-hate-protest/">
         Read More
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>
     </li>
     <li class="o-chron-post o-card u-flex-col u-flex-row@desktop">
      <noscript class="u-lazy-child">
       <a class="featured-img o-chron-post__img-link o-card__img-cell" href="https://www.themarysue.com/people-cant-stop-punching-this-wax-figure-of-donald-trump-and-who-can-blame-them/">
        <img class="o-chron-post__img o-card__img" src="https://am21.mediaite.com/tms/cnt/uploads/2021/03/waxtrump-432x243.jpg"/>
       </a>
      </noscript>
      <div class="o-chron-post__info o-card__info-cell">
       <h3 class="o-chron-post__headline">
        <a class="o-chron-post__headline-link" href="https://www.themarysue.com/people-cant-stop-punching-this-wax-figure-of-donald-trump-and-who-can-blame-them/">
         People Can't Stop Punching This Wax Figure of Donald Trump and Who Can Blame Them?
        </a>
       </h3>
       <h4 class="o-chron-post__subheading">
        No one, that's who.
       </h4>
       <div class="o-chron-post__meta">
        <div class="o-dateline o-chron-post__dateline">
         <span class="o-dateline__author">
          <span class="o-dateline__author-prefix">
           By
          </span>
          Chelsea Steiner
         </span>
         <span class="o-dateline__date">
          Mar 21st
         </span>
        </div>
        <a class="o-comments-link o-chron-post__comments" data-disqus-identifier="541121 https://www.themarysue.com/?p=541121" href="https://www.themarysue.com/people-cant-stop-punching-this-wax-figure-of-donald-trump-and-who-can-blame-them/#disqus_thread">
        </a>
       </div>
       <div class="o-chron-post__excerpt">
        <p class="o-chron-post__excerpt-text">
         It turns out Ripley's, I CAN believe it!
        </p>
        <a class="o-chron-post__excerpt-read-more" href="https://www.themarysue.com/people-cant-stop-punching-this-wax-figure-of-donald-trump-and-who-can-blame-them/">
         Read More
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>
     </li>
     <li class="o-chron-post o-card u-flex-col u-flex-row@desktop">
      <noscript class="u-lazy-child">
       <a class="featured-img o-chron-post__img-link o-card__img-cell" href="https://www.themarysue.com/things-we-saw-today-the-teasers-for-amazons-them-give-us-the-creeps/">
        <img class="o-chron-post__img o-card__img" src="https://am22.mediaite.com/tms/cnt/uploads/2021/03/pjimage-81-432x243.jpg"/>
       </a>
      </noscript>
      <div class="o-chron-post__info o-card__info-cell">
       <h3 class="o-chron-post__headline">
        <a class="o-chron-post__headline-link" href="https://www.themarysue.com/things-we-saw-today-the-teasers-for-amazons-them-give-us-the-creeps/">
         Things We Saw Today: The Teasers for Amazon's
         <em>
          Them
         </em>
         Give Us the Creeps
        </a>
       </h3>
       <h4 class="o-chron-post__subheading">
        Plus Daria, Lucy Lawless, and more!
       </h4>
       <div class="o-chron-post__meta">
        <div class="o-dateline o-chron-post__dateline">
         <span class="o-dateline__author">
          <span class="o-dateline__author-prefix">
           By
          </span>
          Chelsea Steiner
         </span>
         <span class="o-dateline__date">
          Mar 20th
         </span>
        </div>
        <a class="o-comments-link o-chron-post__comments" data-disqus-identifier="541112 https://www.themarysue.com/?p=541112" href="https://www.themarysue.com/things-we-saw-today-the-teasers-for-amazons-them-give-us-the-creeps/#disqus_thread">
        </a>
       </div>
       <div class="o-chron-post__excerpt">
        <p class="o-chron-post__excerpt-text">
         Since the end of season one of
         <em>
          LoveCraft Country
         </em>
         , we've been looking for our next horror series obsession.
        </p>
        <a class="o-chron-post__excerpt-read-more" href="https://www.themarysue.com/things-we-saw-today-the-teasers-for-amazons-them-give-us-the-creeps/">
         Read More
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>
     </li>
     <li class="o-chron-post o-card u-flex-col u-flex-row@desktop">
      <noscript class="u-lazy-child">
       <a class="featured-img o-chron-post__img-link o-card__img-cell" href="https://www.themarysue.com/steppenwolf-and-darkseid-struggle-to-be-compelling-villains-in-zack-snyders-justice-league/">
        <img class="o-chron-post__img o-card__img" src="https://am21.mediaite.com/tms/cnt/uploads/2021/03/pjimage-80-432x243.jpg"/>
       </a>
      </noscript>
      <div class="o-chron-post__info o-card__info-cell">
       <h3 class="o-chron-post__headline">
        <a class="o-chron-post__headline-link" href="https://www.themarysue.com/steppenwolf-and-darkseid-struggle-to-be-compelling-villains-in-zack-snyders-justice-league/">
         Steppenwolf and Darkseid Struggle To Be Compelling Villains in
         <em>
          Zack Snyder's Justice League
         </em>
        </a>
       </h3>
       <h4 class="o-chron-post__subheading">
        The Snyder cut vastly improves
        <em>
         Justice League
        </em>
        , but its villains still leave me cold.
       </h4>
       <div class="o-chron-post__meta">
        <div class="o-dateline o-chron-post__dateline">
         <span class="o-dateline__author">
          <span class="o-dateline__author-prefix">
           By
          </span>
          Chelsea Steiner
         </span>
         <span class="o-dateline__date">
          Mar 20th
         </span>
        </div>
        <a class="o-comments-link o-chron-post__comments" data-disqus-identifier="541099 https://www.themarysue.com/?p=541099" href="https://www.themarysue.com/steppenwolf-and-darkseid-struggle-to-be-compelling-villains-in-zack-snyders-justice-league/#disqus_thread">
        </a>
       </div>
       <div class="o-chron-post__excerpt">
        <p class="o-chron-post__excerpt-text">
         In a film that's four hours long, I wish that Snyder had devoted more time to fleshing out either of his villains.
        </p>
        <a class="o-chron-post__excerpt-read-more" href="https://www.themarysue.com/steppenwolf-and-darkseid-struggle-to-be-compelling-villains-in-zack-snyders-justice-league/">
         Read More
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>
     </li>
     <li class="o-chron-post o-card u-flex-col u-flex-row@desktop">
      <noscript class="u-lazy-child">
       <a class="featured-img o-chron-post__img-link o-card__img-cell" href="https://www.themarysue.com/ask-the-mary-sues-lets-talk-reluctant-partners-and-the-enemies-to-friends-trope/">
        <img class="o-chron-post__img o-card__img" src="https://am24.mediaite.com/tms/cnt/uploads/2021/02/The-Falcon-and-the-Winter-Soldier-1-432x243.jpg"/>
       </a>
      </noscript>
      <div class="o-chron-post__info o-card__info-cell">
       <h3 class="o-chron-post__headline">
        <a class="o-chron-post__headline-link" href="https://www.themarysue.com/ask-the-mary-sues-lets-talk-reluctant-partners-and-the-enemies-to-friends-trope/">
         Ask the Mary Sues: Let's Talk Reluctant Partners and the 'Enemies to Friends' Trope
        </a>
       </h3>
       <h4 class="o-chron-post__subheading">
        Let's look at our top picks for antagonistic team-ups!
       </h4>
       <div class="o-chron-post__meta">
        <div class="o-dateline o-chron-post__dateline">
         <span class="o-dateline__author">
          <span class="o-dateline__author-prefix">
           By
          </span>
          Chelsea Steiner
         </span>
         <span class="o-dateline__date">
          Mar 20th
         </span>
        </div>
        <a class="o-comments-link o-chron-post__comments" data-disqus-identifier="540923 https://www.themarysue.com/?p=540923" href="https://www.themarysue.com/ask-the-mary-sues-lets-talk-reluctant-partners-and-the-enemies-to-friends-trope/#disqus_thread">
        </a>
       </div>
       <div class="o-chron-post__excerpt">
        <p class="o-chron-post__excerpt-text">
         Who are your favorite reluctant partners? Let us know in the comments!
        </p>
        <a class="o-chron-post__excerpt-read-more" href="https://www.themarysue.com/ask-the-mary-sues-lets-talk-reluctant-partners-and-the-enemies-to-friends-trope/">

        </a>

     </li>
     <li class="o-chron-post o-card u-flex-col u-flex-row@desktop">
      <noscript class="u-lazy-child">
       <a class="featured-img o-chron-post__img-link o-card__img-cell" href="https://www.themarysue.com/so-i-like-ben-afflecks-batman-now-what/">
        <img class="o-chron-post__img o-card__img" src="https://am23.mediaite.com/tms/cnt/uploads/2021/03/batfleck-432x243.jpeg"/>
       </a>
      </noscript>
      <div class="o-chron-post__info o-card__info-cell">
       <h3 class="o-chron-post__headline">
        <a class="o-chron-post__headline-link" href="https://www.themarysue.com/so-i-like-ben-afflecks-batman-now-what/">
         So I Like Ben Affleck's Batman Now? What?
        </a>
       </h3>
       <div class="o-chron-post__meta">
        <div class="o-dateline o-chron-post__dateline">
         <span class="o-dateline__author">
          <span class="o-dateline__author-prefix">
           By
          </span>
          Rachel Leishman
         </span>
         <span class="o-dateline__date">
          Mar 19th
         </span>
        </div>
        <a class="o-comments-link o-chron-post__comments" data-disqus-identifier="541066 https://www.themarysue.com/?p=541066" href="https://www.themarysue.com/so-i-like-ben-afflecks-batman-now-what/#disqus_thread">
        </a>
       </div>
       <div class="o-chron-post__excerpt">
        <p class="o-chron-post__excerpt-text">
         Being a Bruce Wayne fan means I'm constantly disappointed one way or another.
        </p>
        <a class="o-chron-post__excerpt-read-more" href="https://www.themarysue.com/so-i-like-ben-afflecks-batman-now-what/">
         Read More
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>
     </li>
     <li class="o-chron-post o-card u-flex-col u-flex-row@desktop">
      <noscript class="u-lazy-child">
       <a class="featured-img o-chron-post__img-link o-card__img-cell" href="https://www.themarysue.com/idw-sonic-30th-anniversary/">
        <img class="o-chron-post__img o-card__img" src="https://am24.mediaite.com/tms/cnt/uploads/2021/03/Sonic-anniversary-books-432x243.jpg"/>
       </a>
      </noscript>
      <div class="o-chron-post__info o-card__info-cell">
       <h3 class="o-chron-post__headline">
        <a class="o-chron-post__headline-link" href="https://www.themarysue.com/idw-sonic-30th-anniversary/">
         IDW Publishing Joins the Celebration of Sonic the Hedgehog's 30th Anniversary With a Special Comic Book Collaboration
        </a>
       </h3>
       <h4 class="o-chron-post__subheading">
        An 80-page comic is way past cool!
       </h4>
       <div class="o-chron-post__meta">
        <div class="o-dateline o-chron-post__dateline">
         <span class="o-dateline__author">
          <span class="o-dateline__author-prefix">
           By
          </span>
          Briana Lawrence
         </span>
         <span class="o-dateline__date">
          Mar 19th
         </span>
        </div>
        <a class="o-comments-link o-chron-post__comments" data-disqus-identifier="541043 https://www.themarysue.com/?p=541043" href="https://www.themarysue.com/idw-sonic-30th-anniversary/#disqus_thread">
        </a>
       </div>
       <div class="o-chron-post__excerpt">
        <p class="o-chron-post__excerpt-text">
         IDW has announced an 80-page comic to celebrate the 30th anniversary of Sonic the Hedgehog! We've got details on each story being created for the collection!
        </p>
        <a class="o-chron-post__excerpt-read-more" href="https://www.themarysue.com/idw-sonic-30th-anniversary/">
         Read More
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>
     </li>
     <li class="o-chron-post o-card u-flex-col u-flex-row@desktop">
      <noscript class="u-lazy-child">
       <a class="featured-img o-chron-post__img-link o-card__img-cell" href="https://www.themarysue.com/hbo-developing-3-more-game-of-thrones-spin-offs-why/">
        <img class="o-chron-post__img o-card__img" src="https://am22.mediaite.com/tms/cnt/uploads/2018/06/got_group.0-432x243.jpg"/>
       </a>
      </noscript>
      <div class="o-chron-post__info o-card__info-cell">
       <h3 class="o-chron-post__headline">
        <a class="o-chron-post__headline-link" href="https://www.themarysue.com/hbo-developing-3-more-game-of-thrones-spin-offs-why/">
         HBO Developing 3 More
         <em>
          Game of Thrones
         </em>
         Spin-Offs and We Must Ask ... Why?
        </a>
       </h3>
       <h4 class="o-chron-post__subheading">
        What do we say to the god of franchises?
       </h4>
       <div class="o-chron-post__meta">
        <div class="o-dateline o-chron-post__dateline">
         <span class="o-dateline__author">
          <span class="o-dateline__author-prefix">
           By
          </span>
          Jessica Mason
         </span>
         <span class="o-dateline__date">
          Mar 19th
         </span>
        </div>
        <a class="o-comments-link o-chron-post__comments" data-disqus-identifier="541001 https://www.themarysue.com/?p=541001" href="https://www.themarysue.com/hbo-developing-3-more-game-of-thrones-spin-offs-why/#disqus_thread">
        </a>
       </div>
       <div class="o-chron-post__excerpt">
        <p class="o-chron-post__excerpt-text">
         HBO is developing still more potential spin-offs of Game of Thrones: 9 Voyages aka Sea Snake, Flea Bottom, and 10,000 Ships.
        </p>
        <a class="o-chron-post__excerpt-read-more" href="https://www.themarysue.com/hbo-developing-3-more-game-of-thrones-spin-offs-why/">
         Read More
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>
     </li>
     <li class="o-chron-post o-card u-flex-col u-flex-row@desktop">
      <noscript class="u-lazy-child">
       <a class="featured-img o-chron-post__img-link o-card__img-cell" href="https://www.themarysue.com/justice-league-snyder-cut-wonder-woman/">
        <img class="o-chron-post__img o-card__img" src="https://am22.mediaite.com/tms/cnt/uploads/2021/03/Diana-in-Snyder-Cut-432x243.jpg"/>
       </a>
      </noscript>
      <div class="o-chron-post__info o-card__info-cell">
       <h3 class="o-chron-post__headline">
        <a class="o-chron-post__headline-link" href="https://www.themarysue.com/justice-league-snyder-cut-wonder-woman/">
         The
         <em>
          Justice League
         </em>
         Snyder Cut Gave Me the Wonder Woman I Hoped For
        </a>
       </h3>
       <div class="o-chron-post__meta">
        <div class="o-dateline o-chron-post__dateline">
         <span class="o-dateline__author">
          <span class="o-dateline__author-prefix">
           By
          </span>
          Rachel Leishman
         </span>
         <span class="o-dateline__date">
          Mar 19th
         </span>
        </div>
        <a class="o-comments-link o-chron-post__comments" data-disqus-identifier="540997 https://www.themarysue.com/?p=540997" href="https://www.themarysue.com/justice-league-snyder-cut-wonder-woman/#disqus_thread">
        </a>
       </div>
       <div class="o-chron-post__excerpt">
        <p class="o-chron-post__excerpt-text">
         What I love about the Patty Jenkins' Wonder Woman movies and the Snyder Cut is that Diana Prince doesn't have to prove anything.
        </p>
        <a class="o-chron-post__excerpt-read-more" href="https://www.themarysue.com/justice-league-snyder-cut-wonder-woman/">
         Read More
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>
     </li>
    </ul>
   </section>
   <aside class="o-sidebar c-sidebar-2" id="sidebar-2">
    <div class="promo promo-sidebar o-sidebar-tips c-sidebar-tips" id="tips">
     <div class="heading o-section-heading o-herald c-tips-sidebar__heading" id="tips-heading">
      <div class="o-section-label">
       Tips
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="c-sidebar-tips__body">
      <a class="c-sidebar-tips__img-link" href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#45312c353605312d202824373c3630206b262a28">
       <img align="left" alt="" height="60" src="https://am21.mediaite.com/tms/cnt/themes/m2019-tms/images/promo-gossip.jpg?v=1" width="78"/>
      </a>
      <p class="c-sidebar-tips__text">
       <a href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#25514c555665514d404844575c5650400b464a48">
        Have a tip or story idea? Email us.
       </a>
       <a href="https://www.themarysue.com/tips/">
        Or to keep it anonymous, click here
       </a>
       .
      </p>
     </div>
    </div>

    </div>
    <script data-cfasync="false" src="/cdn-cgi/scripts/5c5dd728/cloudflare-static/email-decode.min.js">
    </script>
    <script>
     am.log("debug","%cPartner Toggles","color:pink; font-weight:bold; background:black; padding:2px 0 2px; font-size:120%;");
    </script>
    <div class="o-zergnet">
    </div>
    <script>
     /* exported zergnetLoad */
/* globals am */
window.zergnetLoad = () => {
  if (!am.detectMobileWidth) {
    const zergnetRoot = document.querySelector('.o-zergnet');
    const zergnetHerald = document.createElement('div');
    const zergnetHeader = document.createElement('div');
    const zergnetTag = document.createElement('div');
    const zergnetDisclosure = document.createElement('div');
    zergnetHerald.classList.add('o-herald');
    zergnetHerald.classList.add('o-herald-right@desktop');
    zergnetHeader.classList.add('o-zergnet__header');
    zergnetHeader.classList.add('o-section-label');
    zergnetHeader.textContent = 'More Around the Web';
    zergnetDisclosure.classList.add('o-zergnet__disclosure');
    zergnetDisclosure.textContent = 'Ads by Zergnet';
    zergnetTag.id = 'zergnet-widget-45041';
    zergnetTag.classList.add('o-zergnet-unit');
    zergnetHerald.appendChild(zergnetHeader);
    zergnetRoot.appendChild(zergnetHerald);
    zergnetRoot.appendChild(zergnetDisclosure);
    zergnetRoot.appendChild(zergnetTag);
    am.loadScript('https://www.zergnet.com/zerg.js?id=45041');
  }
};
    </script>
    <script>
     am.log("debug","%czergnet%c %con", "color:pink;","","color:green;");
    </script>

   <section class="o-fcc-2x@desktop c-home-chron-posts c-home-chron-posts-part2 o-chron-posts o-card-container u-lazy-parent" id="home-chron-posts-part2">
    <div class="heading o-section-heading o-herald c-home-chron-posts-heading" id="chron-heading">
     <div class="o-section-label">
      Happening Now
     </div>
    </div>
    <ul class="c-home-chron-post-list o-card-list">
     <li class="o-chron-post o-card u-flex-col u-flex-row@desktop">
      <noscript class="u-lazy-child">
       <a class="featured-img o-chron-post__img-link o-card__img-cell" href="https://www.themarysue.com/this-week-in-space-nasa-came-to-sxsw/">
        <img class="o-chron-post__img o-card__img" src="https://am24.mediaite.com/tms/cnt/uploads/2021/03/GettyImages-1229635406-432x243.jpg"/>
       </a>
      </noscript>
      <div class="o-chron-post__info o-card__info-cell">
       <h3 class="o-chron-post__headline">
        <a class="o-chron-post__headline-link" href="https://www.themarysue.com/this-week-in-space-nasa-came-to-sxsw/">
         This Week In Space: NASA Came To SXSW!
        </a>
       </h3>
       <h4 class="o-chron-post__subheading">
        Microgravity, orbit and ... salads?
       </h4>
       <div class="o-chron-post__meta">
        <div class="o-dateline o-chron-post__dateline">
         <span class="o-dateline__author">
          <span class="o-dateline__author-prefix">
           By
          </span>
          Jessica Mason
         </span>
         <span class="o-dateline__date">
          Mar 19th
         </span>
        </div>
        <a class="o-comments-link o-chron-post__comments" data-disqus-identifier="540991 https://www.themarysue.com/?p=540991" href="https://www.themarysue.com/this-week-in-space-nasa-came-to-sxsw/#disqus_thread">
        </a>
       </div>
       <div class="o-chron-post__excerpt">
        <p class="o-chron-post__excerpt-text">
         NASA astronauts Victor Glover and Kate Rubins spoke from the International Space Station about their work on the station at SXSW.
        </p>
        <a class="o-chron-post__excerpt-read-more" href="https://www.themarysue.com/this-week-in-space-nasa-came-to-sxsw/">
         Read More
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>
     </li>
     <li class="o-chron-post o-card u-flex-col u-flex-row@desktop">
      <noscript class="u-lazy-child">
       <a class="featured-img o-chron-post__img-link o-card__img-cell" href="https://www.themarysue.com/sxsw-review-ayar/">
        <img class="o-chron-post__img o-card__img" src="https://am21.mediaite.com/tms/cnt/uploads/2021/03/Ayar-SXSW-432x243.jpeg"/>
       </a>
      </noscript>
      <div class="o-chron-post__info o-card__info-cell">
       <h3 class="o-chron-post__headline">
        <a class="o-chron-post__headline-link" href="https://www.themarysue.com/sxsw-review-ayar/">
         SXSW Review:
         <em>
          Ayar
         </em>
         Is a Pandemic Fever Dream Come to Life
        </a>
       </h3>
       <h4 class="o-chron-post__subheading">
        3 out of 5 stars.
       </h4>
       <div class="o-chron-post__meta">
        <div class="o-dateline o-chron-post__dateline">
         <span class="o-dateline__author">
          <span class="o-dateline__author-prefix">
           By
          </span>
          Lyra Hale
         </span>
         <span class="o-dateline__date">
          Mar 19th
         </span>
        </div>
        <a class="o-comments-link o-chron-post__comments" data-disqus-identifier="541040 https://www.themarysue.com/?p=541040" href="https://www.themarysue.com/sxsw-review-ayar/#disqus_thread">
        </a>
       </div>
       <div class="o-chron-post__excerpt">
        <p class="o-chron-post__excerpt-text">
         Ayar, which premiered at SXSW, is a pandemic fever dream disguised as the story of a mother trying to visit her daughter after years of not seeing her.
        </p>
        <a class="o-chron-post__excerpt-read-more" href="https://www.themarysue.com/sxsw-review-ayar/">
         Read More
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>
     </li>
     <li class="o-chron-post o-card u-flex-col u-flex-row@desktop">
      <noscript class="u-lazy-child">
       <a class="featured-img o-chron-post__img-link o-card__img-cell" href="https://www.themarysue.com/netflix-varsity-blues-college-scam/">
        <img class="o-chron-post__img o-card__img" src="https://am23.mediaite.com/tms/cnt/uploads/2021/03/operation-college-sucks-432x243.jpg"/>
       </a>
      </noscript>
      <div class="o-chron-post__info o-card__info-cell">
       <h3 class="o-chron-post__headline">
        <a class="o-chron-post__headline-link" href="https://www.themarysue.com/netflix-varsity-blues-college-scam/">
         Netflix’s
         <em>
          Operation Varsity Blues
         </em>
         Is a Reminder That College Is Kind of a Scam in Itself
        </a>
       </h3>
       <div class="o-chron-post__meta">
        <div class="o-dateline o-chron-post__dateline">
         <span class="o-dateline__author">
          <span class="o-dateline__author-prefix">
           By
          </span>
          Princess Weekes
         </span>
         <span class="o-dateline__date">
          Mar 19th
         </span>
        </div>
        <a class="o-comments-link o-chron-post__comments" data-disqus-identifier="541007 https://www.themarysue.com/?p=541007" href="https://www.themarysue.com/netflix-varsity-blues-college-scam/#disqus_thread">
        </a>
       </div>
       <div class="o-chron-post__excerpt">
        <p class="o-chron-post__excerpt-text">
         Satan works fast, but docuseries about current events works faster. Earlier this week the Netflix documentary/reenactment
         <em>
          Operation Varsity Blues
         </em>
         came out and it didn't offer much new information in terms of the scandal, but it highlighted something important. College is a scam.
        </p>
        <a class="o-chron-post__excerpt-read-more" href="https://www.themarysue.com/netflix-varsity-blues-college-scam/">
         Read More
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>

     <li class="o-chron-post o-card u-flex-col u-flex-row@desktop">

      </noscript>
      <div class="o-chron-post__info o-card__info-cell">
       <h3 class="o-chron-post__headline">
        <a class="o-chron-post__headline-link" href="https://www.themarysue.com/rand-paul-anti-masker-theater/">

       <div class="o-chron-post__meta">

     <li class="o-chron-post o-card u-flex-col u-flex-row@desktop">

      </noscript>
      <div class="o-chron-post__info o-card__info-cell">
       <h3 class="o-chron-post__headline">
        <a class="o-chron-post__headline-link" href="https://www.themarysue.com/weekday-anime-march-19/">
         The Weekday Anime Round-up Presents: I Don't Want It to Be Over
        </a>
       </h3>
       <h4 class="o-chron-post__subheading">
        The season is nearing it's end
       </h4>
       <div class="o-chron-post__meta">
        <div class="o-dateline o-chron-post__dateline">
         <span class="o-dateline__author">
          <span class="o-dateline__author-prefix">
           By
          </span>
          Briana Lawrence
         </span>
         <span class="o-dateline__date">
          Mar 19th
         </span>
        </div>
        <a class="o-comments-link o-chron-post__comments" data-disqus-identifier="540965 https://www.themarysue.com/?p=540965" href="https://www.themarysue.com/weekday-anime-march-19/#disqus_thread">
        </a>
       </div>
       <div class="o-chron-post__excerpt">
        <p class="o-chron-post__excerpt-text">

         Read More
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>
     </li>
     <li class="o-chron-post o-card u-flex-col u-flex-row@desktop">
      <noscript class="u-lazy-child">
       <a class="featured-img o-chron-post__img-link o-card__img-cell" href="https://www.themarysue.com/sxsw-review-see-you-then/">
        <img class="o-chron-post__img o-card__img" src="https://am24.mediaite.com/tms/cnt/uploads/2021/03/See-You-Then-432x243.jpg"/>
       </a>
      </noscript>
      <div class="o-chron-post__info o-card__info-cell">
       <h3 class="o-chron-post__headline">
        <a class="o-chron-post__headline-link" href="https://www.themarysue.com/sxsw-review-see-you-then/">
         SXSW Review:
         <em>
          See You Then
         </em>
         Is a Slow Burn Look Down Memory Lane
        </a>
       </h3>
       <h4 class="o-chron-post__subheading">
        4 out of 5 stars.
       </h4>
       <div class="o-chron-post__meta">
        <div class="o-dateline o-chron-post__dateline">
         <span class="o-dateline__author">
          <span class="o-dateline__author-prefix">
           By
          </span>
          Lyra Hale
         </span>
         <span class="o-dateline__date">
          Mar 19th
         </span>
        </div>
        <a class="o-comments-link o-chron-post__comments" data-disqus-identifier="540932 https://www.themarysue.com/?p=540932" href="https://www.themarysue.com/sxsw-review-see-you-then/#disqus_thread">
        </a>
       </div>
       <div class="o-chron-post__excerpt">
        <p class="o-chron-post__excerpt-text">
         See You Then, premiering at SXSW, tells the story of two people reuniting for one night a decade after breaking up and the consequences that follow.
        </p>
        <a class="o-chron-post__excerpt-read-more" href="https://www.themarysue.com/sxsw-review-see-you-then/">
         Read More
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>
     </li>
     <li class="o-chron-post o-card u-flex-col u-flex-row@desktop">
      <noscript class="u-lazy-child">
       <a class="featured-img o-chron-post__img-link o-card__img-cell" href="https://www.themarysue.com/bucky-barnes-fatws/">
        <img class="o-chron-post__img o-card__img" src="https://am24.mediaite.com/tms/cnt/uploads/2021/03/Oh-No-Bucky-Barnes-What-Are-You-Doing-432x243.jpg"/>
       </a>
      </noscript>
      <div class="o-chron-post__info o-card__info-cell">
       <h3 class="o-chron-post__headline">
        <a class="o-chron-post__headline-link" href="https://www.themarysue.com/bucky-barnes-fatws/">
         Oh No, Bucky Barnes, What Are You Doing on
         <em>
          Falcon and the Winter Soldier
         </em>
         ?
        </a>
       </h3>
       <div class="o-chron-post__meta">
        <div class="o-dateline o-chron-post__dateline">
         <span class="o-dateline__author">
          <span class="o-dateline__author-prefix">
           By
          </span>
          Rachel Leishman
         </span>
         <span class="o-dateline__date">
          Mar 19th
         </span>
        </div>
        <a class="o-comments-link o-chron-post__comments" data-disqus-identifier="540155 https://www.themarysue.com/?p=540155" href="https://www.themarysue.com/bucky-barnes-fatws/#disqus_thread">
        </a>
       </div>
       <div class="o-chron-post__excerpt">
        <p class="o-chron-post__excerpt-text">
         Bucky Barnes is working through his pain and his past in
         <em>
          Falcon and the Winter Soldier
         </em>
         and it's honestly refreshing to see.
        </p>
        <a class="o-chron-post__excerpt-read-more" href="https://www.themarysue.com/bucky-barnes-fatws/">
         Read More
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>
     </li>
     <li class="o-chron-post o-card u-flex-col u-flex-row@desktop">
      <noscript class="u-lazy-child">
       <a class="featured-img o-chron-post__img-link o-card__img-cell" href="https://www.themarysue.com/review-the-snyder-cut-of-justice-league-is-superior-but-not-perfect/">
        <img class="o-chron-post__img o-card__img" src="https://am22.mediaite.com/tms/cnt/uploads/2021/03/justice-league-snyder-edition-432x243.jpg"/>
       </a>
      </noscript>
      <div class="o-chron-post__info o-card__info-cell">
       <h3 class="o-chron-post__headline">
        <a class="o-chron-post__headline-link" href="https://www.themarysue.com/review-the-snyder-cut-of-justice-league-is-superior-but-not-perfect/">
         Review: The Snyder Cut of
         <em>
          Justice League
         </em>
         Is Superior, but Not Perfect
        </a>
       </h3>
       <h4 class="o-chron-post__subheading">
        Rating: 3/5 but also YMMV.
       </h4>
       <div class="o-chron-post__meta">
        <div class="o-dateline o-chron-post__dateline">
         <span class="o-dateline__author">
          <span class="o-dateline__author-prefix">
           By
          </span>
          Princess Weekes
         </span>
         <span class="o-dateline__date">
          Mar 19th
         </span>
        </div>
        <a class="o-comments-link o-chron-post__comments" data-disqus-identifier="540983 https://www.themarysue.com/?p=540983" href="https://www.themarysue.com/review-the-snyder-cut-of-justice-league-is-superior-but-not-perfect/#disqus_thread">
        </a>
       </div>
       <div class="o-chron-post__excerpt">
        <p class="o-chron-post__excerpt-text">
         I enjoyed the Snyder Cut of
         <em>
          Justice League.
         </em>
         Despite the slow-mo, the soundtrack (too much singing!), and just some of my general comic book nerd issues with some of the choices it was leaps and bounds a better version of the story than the theatrical release. So let's talk about the good and the bad of this film on its own merit.
        </p>
        <a class="o-chron-post__excerpt-read-more" href="https://www.themarysue.com/review-the-snyder-cut-of-justice-league-is-superior-but-not-perfect/">
         Read More
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>
     </li>
     <li class="o-chron-post o-card u-flex-col u-flex-row@desktop">
      <noscript class="u-lazy-child">
       <a class="featured-img o-chron-post__img-link o-card__img-cell" href="https://www.themarysue.com/armie-hammer-accused-of-rape-lapd-investigating/">
        <img class="o-chron-post__img o-card__img" src="https://am24.mediaite.com/tms/cnt/uploads/2019/02/armie-hammer-432x243.jpg"/>
       </a>
      </noscript>
      <div class="o-chron-post__info o-card__info-cell">
       <h3 class="o-chron-post__headline">
        <a class="o-chron-post__headline-link" href="https://www.themarysue.com/armie-hammer-accused-of-rape-lapd-investigating/">
         24-Year-Old Woman Accuses Armie Hammer of Rape: "I Thought He Was Going to Kill Me"
        </a>
       </h3>
       <div class="o-chron-post__meta">
        <div class="o-dateline o-chron-post__dateline">
         <span class="o-dateline__author">
          <span class="o-dateline__author-prefix">
           By
          </span>
          Jessica Mason
         </span>
         <span class="o-dateline__date">
          Mar 19th
         </span>
        </div>
        <a class="o-comments-link o-chron-post__comments" data-disqus-identifier="540946 https://www.themarysue.com/?p=540946" href="https://www.themarysue.com/armie-hammer-accused-of-rape-lapd-investigating/#disqus_thread">
        </a>
       </div>
       <div class="o-chron-post__excerpt">
        <p class="o-chron-post__excerpt-text">
         A woman known as Effie has accused actor Armie Hammer of rape, following months of rumors about alleged abuse and sexual violence perpetrated by Hammer.
        </p>
        <a class="o-chron-post__excerpt-read-more" href="https://www.themarysue.com/armie-hammer-accused-of-rape-lapd-investigating/">
         Read More
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>
     </li>
     <li class="o-chron-post o-card u-flex-col u-flex-row@desktop">
      <noscript class="u-lazy-child">
       <a class="featured-img o-chron-post__img-link o-card__img-cell" href="https://www.themarysue.com/our-10-favorite-sxsw-short-films/">
        <img class="o-chron-post__img o-card__img" src="https://am23.mediaite.com/tms/cnt/uploads/2021/03/Sisters-SXSW-432x243.jpg"/>
       </a>
      </noscript>
      <div class="o-chron-post__info o-card__info-cell">
       <h3 class="o-chron-post__headline">
        <a class="o-chron-post__headline-link" href="https://www.themarysue.com/our-10-favorite-sxsw-short-films/">
         My 10 Favorite SXSW Short Films
        </a>
       </h3>
       <h4 class="o-chron-post__subheading">
        From Don't Peek to Sisters.
       </h4>
       <div class="o-chron-post__meta">
        <div class="o-dateline o-chron-post__dateline">
         <span class="o-dateline__author">
          <span class="o-dateline__author-prefix">
           By
          </span>
          Lyra Hale
         </span>
         <span class="o-dateline__date">
          Mar 19th
         </span>
        </div>
        <a class="o-comments-link o-chron-post__comments" data-disqus-identifier="540747 https://www.themarysue.com/?p=540747" href="https://www.themarysue.com/our-10-favorite-sxsw-short-films/#disqus_thread">
        </a>
       </div>
       <div class="o-chron-post__excerpt">
        <p class="o-chron-post__excerpt-text">
         From Don't Peek to Sisters and Are You Still There? Here are my favorite short films from South by Southwest (SXSW).
        </p>
        <a class="o-chron-post__excerpt-read-more" href="https://www.themarysue.com/our-10-favorite-sxsw-short-films/">
         Read More
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>
     </li>
    </ul>
    <nav class="page-navigation c-page-nav">
     <a href="https://www.themarysue.com/page/2/">

     </a>
    </nav>
   </section>
   <aside class="o-sidebar c-sidebar-3" id="sidebar-3">
    <hr/>
    <div class="sidebar-hook" id="sidebar-hook-3">
    </div>
   </aside>
   <section class="o-fcc-full@desktop o-slice c-magazine-post u-lazy-parent" id="magazine-post">
    <div class="o-slice-inner">
     <div class="heading o-section-heading o-herald c-home-magazine-posts-heading" id="magazine-heading">
      <div class="o-section-label">
       Do Not Miss
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="o-card-list">
      <noscript class="u-lazy-child">
       <a class="featured-img c-magazine-post__img-link o-card__img-cell" href="https://www.themarysue.com/race-fishing-book-covers-is-not-only-problematic-it-directly-hurts-authors-of-color/">
        <img class="c-magazine-post__img" src="https://am22.mediaite.com/tms/cnt/uploads/2021/03/Blue-Spangled-Blue-Cover-632x342.jpg"/>
       </a>
      </noscript>
      <div class="o-card__info-cell">
       <h3 class="c-magazine-post__headline">
        <a class="c-magazine-post__headline-link" href="https://www.themarysue.com/race-fishing-book-covers-is-not-only-problematic-it-directly-hurts-authors-of-color/">
         "Race-Fishing" Book Covers Is Not Only Problematic—It Directly Hurts Authors of Color
        </a>
       </h3>
       <div class="o-chron-post__meta">
        <div class="o-dateline c-magazine-post-dateline">
         <span class="o-dateline__author">
          <span class="o-dateline__author-prefix">
           By
          </span>
          Larissa Irankunda
         </span>
         <span class="o-dateline__date">
          Mar 16th
         </span>
        </div>
        <a class="o-comments-link c-magazine-post__comments" data-disqus-identifier="538473 https://www.themarysue.com/?p=538473" href="https://www.themarysue.com/race-fishing-book-covers-is-not-only-problematic-it-directly-hurts-authors-of-color/#disqus_thread">
        </a>
       </div>
       <div class="excerpt c-magazine-post__excerpt">
        <p>
         Discourse erupted when David Bowles revealed the new cover for his book, The Blue-Spangled Blue. On the cover was a beautiful dark-skinned Black girl with braids, standing in front of a deep indigo background and starry outline of a man. An intriguing-looking story no doubt, obviously appearing to be about a Black protagonist embarking on a sci-fi tale amongst the cosmos, or a star-crossed romance featuring a Black female lead. Unfortunately, that was not the case.
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
   </section>

    <script>
     // <![CDATA[
    var disqus_shortname = 'themarysue';
    (function () {
      var nodes = document.getElementsByTagName('span');
      for (var i = 0, url; i < nodes.length; i++) {
        if (nodes[i].className.indexOf('dsq-postid') != -1) {
          nodes[i].parentNode.setAttribute('data-disqus-identifier', nodes[i].getAttribute('rel'));
          url = nodes[i].parentNode.href.split('#', 1);
          if (url.length == 1) url = url[0];
          else url = url[1]
          nodes[i].parentNode.href = url + '#disqus_thread';
        }
      }
      var s = document.createElement('script'); s.async = true;
      s.type = 'text/javascript';
      s.src = '//' + 'disqus.com/forums/' + disqus_shortname + '/count.js';
      (document.getElementsByTagName('HEAD')[0] || document.getElementsByTagName('BODY')[0]).appendChild(s);
    }());
  //]]>
    </script>
    <!-- End Footer JavaScript -->
